enhanced_by.reason: The method 'lockedProductList' should be invoked to ensure that the product list is available before subscribing to a locked product.
The method 'simpleAccount' provides account details that might be necessary to validate the subscription process.
The method 'lockedSubscriptionRecord' can be used to verify the subscription record after 'subscribeLockedProduct' is executed.
The method 'lockedProductPosition' can be used to verify the updated position after a successful subscription.
